   19: %%
   20: -module(sasl_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Prior to OTP 26, maybe_expr used to require runtime support. As it's now
   23: %% enabled by default, all modules are tagged with the feature even when they
   24: %% don't use it. Therefore, we explicitly disable it until OTP 25 is out of
   25: %% support.
   26: -feature(maybe_expr, disable).
   27: -compile(r24).
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Test server specific exports
   32: -export([init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1]).
   33: -export([all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   34: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases must be exported.
   37: -export([app_test/1,
   38: 	 appup_test/1,
   39: 	 log_mf_h_env/1,
   40: 	 log_file/1,
   41: 	 utc_log/1]).
   42: 
   43: all() -> 
   44:     [log_mf_h_env, log_file, app_test, appup_test, utc_log].
   45: 
   46: groups() -> 
   47:     [].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     S = application:get_env(kernel,logger_sasl_compatible),
   51:     application:set_env(kernel,logger_sasl_compatible,true),
   52:     [{sasl_compatible,S}|Config].
   53: 
   54: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   55:     case ?config(sasl_compatible,Config) of
   56:         {ok,X} ->
   57:             application:set_env(kernel,logger_sasl_compatible,X);
   58:         undefined ->
   59:             application:unset_env(kernel,logger_sasl_compatible)
   60:     end.
   61: 
   62: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: 
   69: init_per_testcase(appup_test, Config) ->
   70:     %% We check if the test results were released using a version
   71:     %% of Erlang/OTP that was a tagged version or not. On a non-tagged
   72:     %% version this testcase most likely will fail.
   73:     case file:read_file(
   74:            filename:join(
   75:              proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "otp_version_tickets")) of
   76:         {ok,<<"DEVELOPMENT",_/binary>>} ->
   77:             {skip, "This is a development version, test might fail "
   78:              "because of incorrect version numbers"};
   79:         {ok,S} ->
   80:             Config
   81:     end;
   82: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     test_server:app_test(sasl, allow),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: %% Test that appup allows upgrade from/downgrade to a maximum of one
   92: %% major release back.
   93: appup_test(_Config) ->
   94:     appup_tests(sasl,create_test_vsns(sasl)).
   95: 
   96: appup_tests(App,{OkVsns0,NokVsns}) ->
   97:     application:load(App),
   98:     {_,_,Vsn} = lists:keyfind(App,1,application:loaded_applications()),
   99:     AppupFileName = atom_to_list(App) ++ ".appup",
  100:     AppupFile = filename:join([code:lib_dir(App),ebin,AppupFileName]),
  101:     {ok,[{Vsn,UpFrom,DownTo}=AppupScript]} = file:consult(AppupFile),
  102:     ct:log("~p~n",[AppupScript]),
  103:     OkVsns =
  104: 	case OkVsns0 -- [Vsn] of
  105: 	    OkVsns0 ->
  106: 		OkVsns0;
  107: 	    Ok ->
  108: 		ct:log("Removed current version ~p from the list of ok versions to test.",
  109: 		      [Vsn]),
  110: 		Ok
  111: 	end,
  112:     ct:log("Testing that appup allows upgrade from these versions: ~p~n",
  113: 	   [OkVsns]),
  114:     check_appup(OkVsns,UpFrom,{ok,[restart_new_emulator]}),
  115:     check_appup(OkVsns,DownTo,{ok,[restart_new_emulator]}),
  116:     ct:log("Testing that appup does not allow upgrade from these versions: ~p~n",
  117: 	   [NokVsns]),
  118:     check_appup(NokVsns,UpFrom,error),
  119:     check_appup(NokVsns,DownTo,error),
  120:     ok.
  121: 
  122: create_test_vsns(App) ->
  123:     S = otp_vsns:read_state(),
  124:     Rel = list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release)),
  125:     AppStr = atom_to_list(App),
  126:     Ok = ok_app_vsns(S, Rel, AppStr),
  127:     Nok0 = nok_app_vsns(S, Rel, AppStr, hd(Ok)),
  128:     Nok = case Ok of
  129:               [Ok1|_] ->
  130:                   [Ok1 ++ ",1" | Nok0]; % illegal
  131:               _ ->
  132:                   Nok0
  133:           end,
  134:     {Ok, Nok}.
  135: 
  136: ok_app_vsns(S, Rel, AppStr) ->
  137:     AppVsns0 = get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel-2, AppStr),
  138:     AppVsns1 = get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel-1, AppStr),
  139:     AppVsns2 = try
  140:                    get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel, AppStr)
  141:                catch
  142:                    _:_ -> []
  143:                end,
  144:     lists:usort(AppVsns2 ++ AppVsns1 ++ AppVsns0).
  145: 
  146: nok_app_vsns(S, Rel, AppStr, EarliestOkVsn) ->
  147:     AppVsns0 = get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel-4, AppStr),
  148:     AppVsns1 = get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel-3, AppStr),
  149:     %% Earliest OK version may exist in not OK versions
  150:     %% as well if there were no application version bump
  151:     %% between two releases, so we need to remove it
  152:     %% if that is the case...
  153:     lists:usort(AppVsns1 ++ AppVsns0) -- EarliestOkVsn.
  154: 
  155: get_rel_app_vsns(S, Rel, App) ->
  156:     RelStr = integer_to_list(Rel),
  157:     OtpVsns = otp_vsns:branch_vsns(S, "maint-"++RelStr),
  158:     lists:map(fun (OtpVsn) ->
  159:                       AppVsn = otp_vsns:app_vsn(S, OtpVsn, App),
  160:                       [_, Vsn] = string:lexemes(AppVsn, "-"),
  161:                       Vsn
  162:               end, OtpVsns).
  163: 
  164: check_appup([Vsn|Vsns],Instrs,Expected) ->
  165:     case systools_relup:appup_search_for_version(Vsn, Instrs) of
  166: 	Expected -> check_appup(Vsns,Instrs,Expected);
  167: 	Other -> ct:fail({unexpected_result_for_vsn,Vsn,Other})
  168:     end;
  169: check_appup([],_,_) ->
  170:     ok.
  171: 
  172: 
  173: %% OTP-9185 - fail sasl start if some but not all log_mf_h env vars
  174: %% are given.
  175: log_mf_h_env(Config) ->
  176:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  177:     LogDir = filename:join(PrivDir,sasl_SUITE_log_dir),
  178:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(LogDir),
  179:     application:stop(sasl),
  180:     clear_env(sasl),
  181: 
  182:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,LogDir),
  183:     match_error(missing_config,application:start(sasl)),
  184: 
  185:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxbytes,"xx"),
  186:     match_error(bad_config,application:start(sasl)),
  187: 
  188:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxbytes,50000),
  189:     match_error(missing_config,application:start(sasl)),
  190: 
  191:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxfiles,"xx"),
  192:     match_error(bad_config,application:start(sasl)),
  193: 
  194:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxfiles,2),
  195:     ok = application:unset_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir),
  196:     match_error(missing_config,application:start(sasl)),
  197: 
  198:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,xx),
  199:     match_error(bad_config,application:start(sasl)),
  200: 
  201:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,LogDir),
  202:     ok = application:start(sasl).
  203: 
  204: log_file(Config) ->
  205:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  206:     LogDir  = filename:join(PrivDir,sasl_SUITE_log_dir),
  207:     File    = filename:join(LogDir, "file.log"),
  208:     ok      = filelib:ensure_dir(File),
  209:     application:stop(sasl),
  210:     clear_env(sasl),
  211: 
  212:     _ = test_log_file(File, {file,File}),
  213:     _ = test_log_file(File, {file,File,[write]}),
  214: 
  215:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<"=PROGRESS preserve me\n">>),
  216:     <<"=PROGRESS preserve me\n",_/binary>> =
  217: 	test_log_file(File, {file,File,[append]}),
  218: 
  219:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,sasl_error_logger, tty,
  220: 			     [{persistent, false}]),
  221:     ok = application:start(sasl).
  222: 
  223: test_log_file(File, Arg) ->
  224:     ok = application:set_env(sasl, sasl_error_logger, Arg,
  225: 			     [{persistent, true}]),
  226:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  227:     application:stop(sasl),
  228:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  229:     ok = file:delete(File),
  230:     Lines0 = binary:split(Bin, <<"\n">>, [trim_all,global]),
  231:     Lines = [L || L <- Lines0,
  232: 		  binary:match(L, <<"=PROGRESS">>) =:= {0,9}],
  233:     io:format("~p:\n~p\n", [Arg,Lines]),
  234: 
  235:     %% There must be at least four PROGRESS lines.
  236:     if
  237: 	length(Lines) >= 4 -> ok;
  238: 	true -> ct:fail({progress, Lines})
  239:     end,
  240:     Bin.
  241: 
  242: %% Make a basic test of utc_log.
  243: utc_log(Config) ->
  244:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  245:     LogDir = filename:join(PrivDir, sasl_SUITE_log_dir),
  246:     Log = filename:join(LogDir, "utc.log"),
  247:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(Log),
  248: 
  249:     application:stop(sasl),
  250:     clear_env(sasl),
  251: 
  252:     %% Test that the UTC marker gets added to PROGRESS lines
  253:     %% when the utc_log configuration variable is set to true.
  254:     ok = application:set_env(sasl, sasl_error_logger, {file,Log},
  255: 			     [{persistent,true}]),
  256:     ok = application:set_env(sasl, utc_log, true, [{persistent,true}]),
  257:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  258:     application:stop(sasl),
  259: 
  260:     verify_utc_log(Log, true),
  261: 
  262:     %% Test that no UTC markers gets added to PROGRESS lines
  263:     %% when the utc_log configuration variable is set to false.
  264:     ok = application:set_env(sasl, utc_log, false, [{persistent,true}]),
  265:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  266:     application:stop(sasl),
  267: 
  268:     verify_utc_log(Log, false),
  269: 
  270:     %% Test that no UTC markers gets added to PROGRESS lines
  271:     %% when the utc_log configuration variable is unset.
  272:     ok = application:unset_env(sasl, utc_log, [{persistent,true}]),
  273:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  274:     application:stop(sasl),
  275: 
  276:     verify_utc_log(Log, false),
  277: 
  278:     %% Change back to the standard TTY error logger.
  279:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,sasl_error_logger, tty,
  280: 			     [{persistent, false}]),
  281:     ok = application:start(sasl).
  282: 
  283: verify_utc_log(Log, UTC) ->
  284:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Log),
  285:     ok = file:delete(Log),
  286: 
  287:     Lines0 = binary:split(Bin, <<"\n">>, [trim_all,global]),
  288:     Lines = [L || L <- Lines0,
  289: 		  binary:match(L, <<"=PROGRESS">>) =:= {0,9}],
  290:     Setting = application:get_env(sasl, utc_log),
  291:     io:format("utc_log ~p:\n~p\n", [Setting,Lines]),
  292:     Filtered = [L || L <- Lines,
  293: 		     binary:match(L, <<" UTC ===">>) =:= nomatch],
  294:     %% Filtered now contains all lines WITHOUT any UTC markers.
  295:     case UTC of
  296: 	false ->
  297: 	    %% No UTC marker on the PROGRESS line.
  298: 	    Filtered = Lines;
  299: 	true ->
  300: 	    %% Each PROGRESS line must have an UTC marker.
  301: 	    [] = Filtered
  302:     end,
  303:     ok.
  304: 
  305: 
  306: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  307: %% Internal
  308: match_error(Expected,{error,{bad_return,{_,{'EXIT',{Expected,{sasl,_}}}}}}) ->
  309:     ok;
  310: match_error(Expected,Actual) ->
  311:     ct:fail({unexpected_return,Expected,Actual}).
  312: 
  313: clear_env(App) ->
  314:     [application:unset_env(App,Opt) || {Opt,_} <- application:get_all_env(App)],
  315:     ok.
